About the Company: Excel Crop Care actively promotes Integrated Pest Management (IPM) to Indian farmers. The company demonstrates the use of Integrated Crop Management (ICM) techniques to the farmers, using innovative methods.The company`s product range includes Insecticides-Endosulfan  Chlorpyriphos  Profenophos  Imidachloprid, Fungicides-Sulfex (Wettable Sulfur)  Sulfex Gold (Wettable Sulfur)  Crop Diseases,Herbicides- Isopropylamine Salt of Glyphosate  Ammonium Salt of Glyphosate,Rodenticides-Zinc phosphide,Fumigants-Aluminium Phosphide,Biologicals - Composter  Soil Enricher  Organic Fertilizer  Nutrient Mobilizer  Seed growth enhancer  Plant Growth Enhancers  Biopesticides, Fishery Segment - FishcelTM,Other Products- Seed Dressing  Plant Growth Promoter.
